columns.label: Contract address
columns.description: The address of the contract in question. Case-sensitive only if required by the blockchain that the address pertains to (e.g. Solana).

columns.label: Domain name
columns.description: The specific (sub)domain name of the dApp where this contract is meant to be accessed from.  Wildcards (*) are acceptable as part of this field if proof can be shown that the contract is intended to be used across multiple domains.

columns.label: Visual proof
columns.description: If the domain is a specific root or subdomain, this must be a screenshot of the exact page and setup where this particular address can be interacted from.
